original_text: I will cause the Egyptian people to run away to live in foreign countries. I will cause the Egyptian people to run away to live in foreign countries.
korean_text: 애굽 사람을 뭇 나라 가운데로 흩으며 뭇 백성 가운데로 헤칠지라

sentences.original_text: I will cause the Egyptian people to run away
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 애굽 백성들이 도망하게 할 것이다
